name: JNF: Widen Revenge of the Meepits
description:
Takes the Jellyneo Forums Revenge of the Meepits skin and makes it 98%, rather than 80%, if you hate wasted space.

More accurately, it takes any Jellyneo Forums skin and makes it 98% of the page, not just Revenge of the Meepits. But that's the one I made it for :P
